title: Lee Morgan - 1964 - Search For The New Land (vinyl 24 96) FLAC
description:
Lee Morgan - 1964 - Search For The New Land
Vinyl 24 bits, 96 Khz

This set (the CD reissue is a duplicate of the original LP) is one of the finest Lee Morgan records. The great trumpeter contributes five challenging compositions ("Search for the New Land," "The Joker," "Mr. Kenyatta," "Melancholee," and "Morgan the Pirate") that deserve to be revived. Morgan, tenor saxophonist Wayne Shorter, guitarist Grant Green, pianist Herbie Hancock, bassist Reggie Workman, and drummer Billy Higgins are all in particularly creative form on the fresh material, and they stretch the boundaries of hard bop (the modern mainstream jazz of the period). The result is a consistently stimulating set that rewards repeated listenings. (AllMusic)

A1 Search For The New Land
A2 The Joker
B1 Mr. Kenyatta
B2 Melancholee
B3 Morgan The Pirate

Personnel:
Lee Morgan - trumpet
Wayne Shorter - tenor sax
Grant Green - guitar 
Herbie Hancock - piano 
Reginald Workman - bass 
Billy Higgins - drums 

Enjoy and share!
